name: Isis: Earth, Wind and Fire
overview: An adventure game featuring music of the band Earth, Wind and Fire. If you can find the three hidden gems, you can launch the ancient ship Isis and sail away from your mystery location, saving the 5000-year-old goddess in distress. This game was originally supposed to be on the 3DO console but was then ported to the PC in 1994, thus cancelling the project for the failing system.
